marklogic.body: I don't see why bitches sitting here talking about how the twins got jumped. Please do remember, them booty little ass girls jumped Elease a number of times for pathetic ass reasons... then got scared once Elease's sister came to town. Truthfully I could give two fucks about any of these girls in the bad girls club, they're all basic bottom bitches. But, I'm Glad the twins got that ass wooping. You don't go around bossing people around and "punking" them because you've got a look-a-like on your tip. They picked the fight, they called out everyone in the house saying they don't care who they fight, they're ready... so expect the Heat to get turned up! point blank. Stop making it seem like the twins are innocent because they're not. Been starting drama from day one and got what was coming to them! hahaha!!!!

target.displayName: Gia on BGC 810: I was trying to beat the soul out of them. | Bad Girls Club | Oxygen
